pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena devadatto parihīnalābhasakkāro sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.5: Kassa sampannaṃ na manāpaṃ, kassa sāduṃ na ruccatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.9: “kathañhi nāma devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, devadatta, sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.13: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.14: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:1.17: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā gilāne bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.4: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.6: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:2.10: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvaradānasamaye sacīvarabhattaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhikkhū nimantenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:3.7: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:3.11: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena manussā cīvarakārake bhikkhū bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:4.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:4.9: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū manussehi saddhiṃ addhānaṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.6: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti—“paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā gaṇabhojanan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.9: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.12: Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:5.13: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū manussehi saddhiṃ nāvāya gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū te manusse etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.6: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na paṭiggaṇhanti—“paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā gaṇabhojanan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.9: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.12: Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:6.13: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.1: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū rājagahaṃ āgacchanti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.2: Manussā nānāverajjake bhikkhū passitvā bhattena nimantenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.6: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.9: Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:7.10: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.1: Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa ñātisālohito ājīvakesu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.2: Atha kho so ājīvako yena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.3: upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.5: “Sace tvaṃ, bhante, buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhojeyyāsi”.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.7: Atha kho so ājīvako bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.10: Atha kho so ājīvako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.11: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.12: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so ājīvako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.15: Adhivāsetu me bhavaṃ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.17: Atha kho so ājīvako bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.18: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.20: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:8.23: Gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo—ayaṃ tattha samayo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.2: yattha cattāro bhikkhū pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.10: anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso, atthate kathine pañcamāsā. “Cīvaradānasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.15: “addhayojanaṃ gacchissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ, gacchantena bhuñjitabbaṃ, gatena bhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.17: “nāvaṃ abhiruhissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ, āruḷhena bhuñjitabbaṃ, oruḷhena bhuñjitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.1.19: yattha dve tayo bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā yāpenti, catutthe āgate na yāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.1: Gaṇabhojane gaṇabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.2: Gaṇabhojane vematiko, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc32:9.2.3: Gaṇabhojane nagaṇabhojanasaññī, aññatra samayā, bhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
